attributes.action: Pressure China with an olympics boycott if necessary to stop the cruelty to animals related to its fur trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has recently come to my attention that animals are being severely mistreated in China for the fur trade. There are pictures of dogs being skinned alive on You tube under "Chinese fur farms". China are not known for their excellent human or animal rights and if they want to raise their profile in the world markets etc they need to address it now.
